name: Scrubz World
description:
Super-cool famous Youtuber Scrubzah shrinks down to game-boy size and dives into this action packed 2D adventure dubbed “Scrubz World “. Scrubz, popular for his in-depth Fortnite videos now has his own game. (OMG Really!!?!) Yes, Really. Collect Scrubzcoins, dodge the bad guys and come out triumphant as you navigate through multiple levels of unpredictable and exciting gameplay. Enjoy!

Disclaimer: We will not be held liable for the loads of fun you experience during gameplay. KeepScrubin,!!

Main game features:

* Multi-platform levels of intense game play.
* Loads of weapons and ammo for you to collect and use to your advantage.
* Tons of enemies to attack, kill and destroy.


Don't forget to follow Scrubzah on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Scrubzah
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thescrubzah
YouTube: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCZOfdLyAShLLkftO-qQ4u-w

This app does not allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and will not contain third party or any forms advertisements.

Scrubz World Game Webpage : http://www.islandbusinessmedia.com/scrubz-world/
Privacy Policy: http://www.islandbusinessmedia.com/scrubz-world/privacy-policy/
